rukus.text: 38|27|Ara amara asamana, yamina o e duyera madhyabarti kono kichu'i anarthaka srsti karini [1]. Anarthaka srsti karara dharana tadera yara kuphari kareche, kaje'i yara kuphari kare tadera jan'ya rayeche agunera durbhoga.
38|28|Yara imana ane o satkaja kare amara ki taderake yamine biparyaya srstikaridera samana ganya karaba? Naki amara muttakiderake aparadhidera samana ganya karaba
38|29|eka mubaraka kitaba, eta amara apanara prati nayila karechi, yate manusa era ayatasamuhe gabhirabhabe cinta kare ebam yate bodhasaktisampanna byaktira grahana kare upadesa.
38|30|Ara amara da'udake dana karalama sula'imana [1]. Kata'i na uttama banda tini! Niscaya tini chilena atisaya allaha abhimukhi.
38|31|Yakhana bikele tara samane drutagami utkrsta asbarajike [1] pesa kara hala
38|32|takhana tini balalena, 'ami to amara rabera smarana hate bimukha haye aisbarya pritite magna haye parechi, edike surya pardara arale cale geche
38|33|‘eguloke amara kache phiriye ana.' Tarapara tini egulora pa ebam gala chedana karate lagalena [1].
38|34|Ara abasya'i amara sula'imanake pariksa karalama ebam tara asanera upara rakhalama ekati dhara [1]; tarapara sula'imana amara abhimukhi halena.
38|35|Tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amake ksama karuna ebam amake dana karuna emana eka rajya [1] ya amara para ara kara'o jan'ya'i prayojya habe na. Niscaya apani parama data.
38|36|Takhana amara tara adhina kare dilama bayuke ya tara adese tini yekhane icche karatena sekhane mrdumandabhabe prabahita hata
38|37|ara (adhina kare dilama) pratyeka prasada nirmanakari o duburi sayatanasamuhake'o
38|39|‘esaba amadera anugraha, ata'eba e theke apani an'yake dite ba nije rakhate parena. Era jan'ya apanake hiseba dite habe na.
38|40|Ara niscaya amadera kache rayeche tara jan'ya naikatyera maryada o uttama pratyabartanasthala.
